data.taskTitle: in sessioncard add copy to clipboard icon
in sessioncard add copy to clipboard icon
data.approach: Add a floating copy-to-clipboard icon button at the top-right corner of the terminal output area (above the minimap). The icon will call the existing copySessionContents() function and show visual feedback when clicked.

data.taskTitle: in sessioncard add copy to clipboard icon
summary: Added floating copy-to-clipboard button at top-right of terminal output area
Button positioned above minimap in agent mode, or at right edge in server mode
Uses existing copySessionContents() function - copies formatted session info + terminal output
Shows checkmark icon on successful copy with green color feedback
Button has hover state with opacity transition for polish
reviewFocus: Verify copy button appears and functions correctly in UI

data.taskTitle: in sessioncard add copy to clipboard icon
summary: Added copy-to-clipboard button in the LEFT control buttons section
Button positioned after keyboard dropdown, alongside attach/autoscroll/stream buttons
Uses existing copySessionContents() function - copies formatted session info + terminal output
Shows checkmark icon on successful copy with success color
Button disabled when no output is available
reviewFocus: Verify copy button appears in control row and functions correctly

data.taskTitle: in sessioncard add copy to clipboard icon
summary: Added copy-to-clipboard button in LEFT control buttons section
Created new Settings dropdown combining autoscroll, livestream, and minimap toggles
Minimap toggle only shown in agent mode (defaults ON, can be disabled per-session)
Each setting shows colored ON indicator when enabled
Reduced icon count by consolidating 2 buttons into 1 dropdown
reviewFocus: Verify minimap can be toggled on/off

summary: Added copy to clipboard icon in SessionCard component
Implemented clipboard functionality with configuration in settings
Updated multiple files to support new clipboard feature

suggestedTasks.title: Add Unit Tests for SessionCard Clipboard Functionality
suggestedTasks.description: Create comprehensive unit tests for the new copy to clipboard feature in SessionCard. Tests should validate clipboard icon visibility, click behavior, and successful text copying for tmux outputs. Focus on testing edge cases and ensuring reliable clipboard interaction across different browsers and environments.
suggestedTasks.reason: Current implementation lacks test coverage for new clipboard feature

patterns: Use of clipboard API for copying content

documentationNeeds: Update user guide to explain new copy to clipboard functionality
